ComicInfo.Summary:
MARS. The near future-ish. A bomb takes out a city block on Harrison Station. The media rush to blame the local terrestrials (re:aliens,) however Superintendent Denton Coyle has a feeling that it may not be so simple... or maybe that feeling is Coyle's hangover gut bomb. It's unclear... like a 50/50 shot, it's a mistake or explosive diarrhea. Maybe it's both? In other words, it's yet another Tuesday on Mars.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Clayton McCormack & Kelly Fitzpatrick | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | David Kuettel & Kat Stockton | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-12 03:48:24. [CVDB585155]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Clayton McCormack, David Kuettel, Kat Stockton, Kelly Fitzpatrick
